title: Lucky Block SkyWars
briefDescription: Lucky Block SkyWars is a game of skywars with lucky blocks! There are extra things such as skills, ridable bats, and more. Place lucky blocks ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Lucky Block SkyWars is a game of skywars with lucky blocks! There are extra things such as skills, ridable bats, and more. Place lucky blocks on the ground and break them to get the loot! There are 4 skills/events and 4 types of lucky blocks. 2-8 players.
Lucky Block SkyWars has all the normal functions of sky wars with the added benefit of a map repair time of under 2 seconds (I can?t guarantee this depending on how bad your device is but it should be quick)!

title: Random Parkour
briefDescription: Play with your friends and try to be the first who claimed 5 points to win .You can play from 1 to 30 players without any lag or ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Play with your friends and try to be the first who claimed 5 points to win .
You can play from 1 to 30 players without any lag or a problem>scoreboard .
And you can play with texture packs and addons with no issues because the map only made with less than 20 commands to evict the lag .
What is this ?
This map is a mulitplayer and solo parkour map .
The map recreate a random possible parkour every time you pass a level .
The map can handle over 20 players moving in the same time because it only has less than 20 command block .
How I play ?

When all players are ready to start click on the ?Start game? button and the map will make a random parkour in 0.3 second after that you and your friends will get teleported to the parkour and try to beat it first to beat get a point after that the map will keep creating random parkours until someone claim 5 points .
When you claim 5 points you?ll win after that the map may take from 3 to 6 seconds to reboot himself .
You can play the map over 100 time without any problems .
Is the parkour possible?

title: DUNGEONS ? Minecraft rpg map
briefDescription: Discover amazing locations! Fight against a variety of enemies! Earn experience points and invest in new, better weapons and face new, more powerful opponents! Solve ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Discover amazing locations! Fight against a variety of enemies! Earn experience points and invest in new, better weapons and face new, more powerful opponents! Solve logical puzzles and uncover the secrets of the places you are in!

The main task is to survive. Discover new locations with ever new opponents. Solve puzzles and find hidden objects to help you move on. All levels are divided into 3 types: easy, medium and hard. For passing an easy level you get 2 LVL, for passing a medium level 15 LVL and difficult level 30 LVL + xp from defeated mobs. For LVL you get loot boxes and additional equipment such as arrows. Weapons and armour elements fall out of the loot boxes. Most of them are non-standard (not in the classic minecraft). Additionally there are ?supply boxes? with free food and arrows.
1)How to gain levels (?LVL? is a currency):
1.1 By completing dungeons
1.2 By putting useless items to ?Trashcan?
1.3 By defeating monsters
2)Dungeons:
All dungeons are divided into 3 types: easy, medium and hard.
?Completing an easy level gives you: 2 LVL
?Completing a medium level gives you: 5 LVL
?Completing a hard level gives you: 30 LVL
P.s. LVL-is an in game currency, and at the same time, in game experience points.
3)Shop:
There are 2 shops, first one is the ?Items shop?, second one is the ?Loot box shop?
3.1 Items shop:
You can buy arrows
3.2 Case shop/Box shop:
You can buy boxes
4)All levels:
4.1 Easy levels:
? Grim forest
? Mineshaft
4.2 Medium levels:
? Cave
? Creeperland
? Ruins
? Underwater
4.3 Hard levels:
? Dungeon
? Pillagers? mansion
? Canyon
Content:
?More than 9 unique maps to complete!
?Custom weapons/blades/armors/artifacts to get!
?Easter eggs/secret chests to find!
?Logical puzzles to solve in almost every level!
?Attractive cases/boxes to open!
Additional info:
Supply box:
The box which gives you some food & arrows every 20 real time minutes.
Supporting single player/multiplayer:
Supports both, and unlimited amounts of players.
You can join our Discord server, and ask something/give feedback about this map or report issue(s)! (Don?t forget to ping @IkoMaster and @PanGangowski when giving feedback/info. about an issue/etc.)
Good luck Adventurer!
Fill out an anonymous survey on this map:
https://forms.gle/qgZ2m3tbyh2WMrJ76

title: Black Lake Camp (Hide & Seek)
briefDescription: Black Lake Camp is a new hide & seek map. The goal of the hider is to hide in the Black Lake Camp away from the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Black Lake Camp is a new hide & seek map. The goal of the hider is to hide in the Black Lake Camp away from the seeker. The seeker is released is 1 minute after the game starts. The seeker?s mission is to kill all the hiders, if you really want you can set your own timer and when that timer ends the players that are left over have won.
Screenshots:

There Are 7 Different Places To Hide:
1. Cave
2. Camp Site
3. Camp Fire
4. Toilet
5. Forest
6. House
7. Lake
This Is Where The Hiders Run Out Of:
In Between The Lake And Cave:
Camp Site:

title: P.V.E. SKY SURVIVAL
briefDescription: In this map you have to kill mobs for you survival. The map comes with an addon which changes the loot tables of the mobs ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
In this map you have to kill mobs for you survival. The map comes with an addon which changes the loot tables of the mobs and makes the ender dragon fight possible. It is a hard skyblock challenge so you can bring friends to help you, as the map is multiplayer friendly. It also has a spawn, custom items, and a mob called loot chicken which will help you progress faster.
Every island has a spawner, so get blocks and start expanding.

title: Slendrina: The Cellar 3 [Horror] [Adventure]
briefDescription: The Final Cellar of Slendrina is here!But now she's prepared for your next move and become so angry. You must escape from her evilness ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The Final Cellar of Slendrina is here!
But now she?s prepared for your next move and become so angry. You must escape from her evilness and not let Slendrina kill you. But can you escape? Can you fight your fears? Are you brave enough to play this map? Well, let?s see.
The final cellar of slendrina is now on Minecraft! If you want to download the other cellar you can find them in this website!
+ How to play?
? Collect keys to unlock locked doors
? Find 8 old missing books and run to the exit door to escape
? Turn around as soon as you see Slendrina otherwise the game is over
+ Game Settings:
? Gamemode = Adventure
? Difficulty = Any
? Show coordinates = False/Off
? In game player names = False/Off
? Hide hand = True/On
+ Game Rules!
? If possible please avoid jumping and looking directly upward or downward this thing can cause glitch
? Do not place or destroy any blocks until the game finished
Multiplayer Compatible?
Well, I?m not sure about this but If you want to play this map with your friends then go ahead but I?m not recommending it, cause like the other cellar this map has also bugs like the other cellar, example: Light glitching and Slendrina glitching, we also tested it to play in multiplayer and its working fine but its less scary,
Watch my trailer here:
Explore the dark cellar
Collect keys
And unlock locked doors
Collect books and run to the exit door to escape

title: Monster Dungeon [WIP]
briefDescription: This map is a rouge like dungeon crawler themed world, something that Minecraft seems to not have. Venture through different dungeons and castles for a ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This map is a rouge like dungeon crawler themed world, something that Minecraft seems to not have. Venture through different dungeons and castles for a high intensity battles with modded mobs.
This World will continue too and is using CodanRaigen21?s Carnage add-on, so all credit to him for the custom mobs.
When entering a room you must clear it before moving onto the next one. Altars with roses around them are Respawn Pedestals, to activated them push the button to set your spawn point.
I barely started to work on this so there will be bugs, sorry and contact me for any issues.

crawledImageUrls.text:
She?s back but in another world
And she?s challenging you to visit her cellar
Do you accept her challenge?
Well let see if you can play this map till end.
This map is based on the original game of SLENDRINA THE CELLAR created by DVloper
This is the first part of Slendrina (Cellar 1) where you need to find 8 old books to escape from Slendrina you also need to find keys to open several doors, look around as soon as you see Slendrina, Never look back
Slendrina the cellar is a slender like horror game
Originally from DVloper
This map is just the Cellar 1
If you expect cellar 1 to 3 I?m so sorry cause if I combined cellar 1, cellar 2, and cellar 3 the world will crash or maybe it won?t work properly
Cellar 2 and Cellar 3 is coming soon

So don?t except anything special..

Try to find a flashlight to see,survive,and try to escape!
